articles.content:
SHANGHAI, Feb 22 (Reuters) - Investor worries over the potential for a fresh wave of regulatory crackdowns by Beijing set off steep drops in Chinese tech shares on Tuesday.

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: HSBC is handing another $1 billion to investors as profits soar - CNN
articles.description: HSBC stock fell Tuesday in Hong Kong, even as it announced plans to buy back up to another $1 billion in shares as  outlined a "significantly" brighter outlook due to the prospect of rising interest rates around the world.

articles.title: Texas oil refinery workers ratify Exxon contract offer, ending lockout - Fox Business
articles.description: Union workers locked out of their jobs at a Texas oil refinery for nearly 10 months voted on Monday by a nearly two-thirds margin to accept an Exxon Mobil Corp contract offer, a union official said.
